scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These papers pertain to the editing of The Best American Short Stories 1987, and include a master proof, electrostatic copies of the stories and four alternates, contributors' notes and a list of "100 other distinguished short stories of the year 1986/selected by Shannon Ravenel."
